definitions.definition: A supply of anything wasted or exhausted; a reinforcement .
A person enlisted for service in the army; a newly enlisted soldier .

examples: These new recruits were hired after passing the interviews

definitions.definition: A new adult or breeding-age member of a certain population .

main_definition: A supply of anything wasted or exhausted; a reinforcement .
secondary_definitions: A person enlisted for service in the army; a newly enlisted soldier .
( biology , ecology ) A new adult or breeding-age member of a certain population .
